Title: Secure File Storage
Description: A web application that allows users to securely upload and store files, with encryption and access controls.

Title: FizzBuzz
Description: A classic interview problem. A script that prints numbers from 1 to 100, but for multiples of three prints 'Fizz', for multiples of five prints 'Buzz', and for multiples of both prints 'FizzBuzz'.

Title: Random Number Generator
Description: A simple web page or script that generates and displays a random number within a user-defined range upon a button click.

Title: Counter App
Description: A basic mobile or web app with buttons to increment, decrement, and reset a counter value. Teaches fundamental state management.

Title: Color Flipper
Description: A web page that generates a random hex color and applies it to the background when a button is clicked. Displays the hex code to the user.

Title: Random Quote Generator
Description: A web page that displays a random quote fetched from a simple array or a public API (like type.fit API) when a button is clicked.

Title: Digital Clock
Description: A simple web page that displays the current time, updating every second. Teaches JavaScript's time functions and DOM updates.

Title: To-Do List (Basic)
Description: A web app where users can add and delete tasks from a list. Tasks are not saved after refresh. Teaches core state management.

Title: Simple Calculator
Description: A basic GUI application that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Involves layout design and handling user input logic.

Title: Password Generator
Description: A desktop or web app that generates a random, secure password based on user-selected criteria like length, numbers, and special characters.

Title: Password Strength Checker
Description: A tool that analyzes a user-input password and provides a strength score based on criteria like length, complexity (letters, numbers, symbols), and common patterns.

Title: BMI Calculator (Mobile)
Description: A simple mobile app (Flutter or React Native) that takes height and weight as input and calculates the Body Mass Index.
Required_material: Flutter SDK or React Native setup

Title: Flashlight Toggle App (Mobile)
Description: A native mobile app with a single button that toggles the device's flashlight on and off. Teaches integration with device hardware APIs.

Title: Basic Web Scraper (Static)
Description: A Python script that scrapes headlines or product titles from a single static web page using libraries like BeautifulSoup.

Title: Stopwatch / Timer App
Description: A web or mobile app with start, stop, lap, and reset functionality. Teaches more complex state management and time-based events.

Title: Tip Calculator
Description: A web or mobile app that calculates a tip and total bill amount based on the bill total, tip percentage, and number of people splitting the bill.

Title: Python Keylogger (Basic)
Description: An 'ethical hacking' script that records all keystrokes and saves them to a local text file. Teaches use of the pynput library.

Title: Simple Network Scanner
Description: A Python script using Scapy or Nmap to scan a local network and identify active IP addresses and open ports on a target host.

Title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game (GUI)
Description: A graphical 2-player Tic-Tac-Toe game. Teaches grid-based UI, game logic, and win-condition checking.

Title: Data Visualization (CSV)
Description: Use a library like Matplotlib or D3.js to load a simple CSV file (e.g., population data) and generate static charts (bar, line, pie).
Required_material: Python or Web browser, Sample CSV dataset

Title: Weather App (API)
Description: A web app that fetches and displays current weather data for a user-input city. Uses a third-party API like OpenWeatherMap.

Title: Unit Converter (Mobile)
Description: A mobile app that converts between various units (e.g., temperature, distance, weight). Teaches UI controls like dropdowns and state updates.
Required_material: Flutter SDK or React Native setup

Title: File Integrity Checker
Description: A script that generates a hash (e.g., SHA-256) for a file or directory of files, stores it, and can later re-check to see if any files have been modified.

Title: JavaScript Slideshow
Description: A web component that cycles through a series of images, with 'next' and 'previous' buttons and possibly dot indicators.

Title: Markdown Previewer
Description: A web application with two panes: one for typing Markdown and a second that displays the rendered HTML in real-time.

Title: Movie Database App (API)
Description: A web app using an API (like TMDB) to browse, search, and display details for movies (e.g., ratings, summary, cast).

Title: Notes App (Local Storage)
Description: A mobile or web app to create, edit, and delete notes, which are saved to the browser's local storage or device's AsyncStorage.

Title: To-Do List (Persistent)
Description: A web app where users can add, edit, and delete tasks. Tasks are saved to the browser's local storage to persist after refresh.

Title: Personal Portfolio Website
Description: A static 3-page website (Home, About, Projects) to showcase your work. Focuses on clean, responsive design.

Title: Expense Tracker (Mobile)
Description: A mobile app to track daily expenses. Users can add income and expenses, categorize transactions, and see a running balance.
Required_material: Flutter SDK or React Native setup

Title: Joke Generator (API)
Description: A web app that fetches a random joke from a public joke API and displays it. Teaches API integration and data handling.

Title: Dynamic Web Scraper
Description: A Python script using Selenium to scrape data from a dynamic website that requires JavaScript to load content (e.g., infinite scroll).

Title: Personal Blog (Frontend + API)
Description: A simple blog platform API backend that can list, create, and delete articles, with a separate frontend to display them.

Title: Weather App (Native)
Description: A native iOS or Android app that shows the current weather for the user's location, using device GPS and a weather API.
Required_material: Android Studio or Xcode, Weather API Key

Title: Recipe Finder App (API)
Description: An app that lets users search for recipes by ingredients, using a public food API (e.g., Edamam or TheMealDB).

Title: Music Player (Desktop)
Description: A desktop application (C# or Python) that can scan a local folder for music files, build a library, and play/pause/skip tracks.

Title: QR Code Scanner (Mobile)
Description: A mobile app that uses the device's camera to scan and decode QR codes, displaying the result to the user.

Title: Hashed Password Cracker
Description: A script that attempts to crack a list of hashed passwords (e.g., MD5, SHA-256) using a dictionary attack (wordlist) or brute-force.

Title: URL Shortening Service
Description: A backend service that takes a long URL and returns a unique short code. When the short code is visited, it redirects to the original URL.

Title: Fake News Detector
Description: A Python-based AI model to classify news articles as 'real' or 'fake' based on their headlines and text. Requires NLP techniques.

Title: Phishing Simulation Tool
Description: A web-based tool that sends simulated phishing emails (to test users) and tracks metrics like 'who clicked' to aid in security training.

Title: Book Library App (API)
Description: A native mobile app using the Google Books API to search for books and create a 'To Read' list, saved on the device.
Required_material: Android Studio or Xcode, Google Books API Key

Title: Simple Blog (Full-Stack)
Description: A full-stack blog platform. Unauthenticated users can read posts. An admin can log in to create, edit, and delete posts.

Title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
Description: A classic machine learning project. Build a model using the MNIST dataset to classify images of handwritten digits (0-9).

Title: Discord Bot
Description: A simple bot for a Discord server that can respond to commands (e.g.,!ping,!roll_dice,!joke). Teaches API and WebSocket interaction.

Title: Simple Malware Scanner (Yara)
Description: A script that uses Yara rules to scan files or directories for patterns matching known malware signatures.

Title: SQL Injection Testing Tool
Description: A script that attempts to detect SQL injection vulnerabilities in a target web URL by sending malicious payloads in form fields.

Title: Wine Quality Prediction
Description: A machine learning model that predicts the quality of wine (as a score) based on chemical properties (e.g., acidity, sugar, alcohol).

Title: Twitter Bot
Description: A script that interacts with the X (Twitter) API to perform actions like auto-replying to mentions, or posting content on a schedule.

Title: Snake Game (Pygame)
Description: A complete implementation of the classic Snake game using Pygame. Involves game loops, event handling, and collision detection.

Title: Library Management System (Desktop)
Description: A desktop GUI application (C# or Java) for managing a library. Includes features to add/search books, manage members, and handle check-in/checkout.
Required_material: C# or Java, SQL Server or SQLite

Title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
Description: A machine learning model to detect fraudulent credit card transactions. A classic project that highlights working with highly imbalanced datasets.
Required_material: Python, Kaggle Credit Card Fraud Dataset

Title: House Price Prediction
Description: A machine learning model that predicts a house's sale price based on its features (e.g., square footage, # of bedrooms, location).

Title: Spam Email Detection
Description: An NLP model that classifies emails as 'spam' or 'ham'. Involves text preprocessing, feature extraction (TF-IDF), and a classification model.
Required_material: Python, Enron Email Dataset or similar

Title: GitHub Profile Finder
Description: A web app that uses the GitHub API to fetch and display a user's profile information and repository list in a clean UI.
Required_material: GitHub API (no key needed for basic info)

Title: News Aggregator (API)
Description: A web app that fetches headlines from multiple sources (e.g., NewsAPI) and displays them in a single, filterable feed.

Title: Real-Time Chat App (Basic)
Description: A simple web chatroom using WebSockets (Socket.io) or Firebase. Users can join, send messages, and see messages from others in real-time.

Title: Recipe App (Native)
Description: A native mobile app for browsing recipes, searching by ingredients, and saving favorites to device storage or a simple database.
Required_material: Android Studio or Xcode, Recipe API Key

Title: Habit Tracker (Full-Stack)
Description: A full-stack web or mobile app to track daily habits. Users can log in, define habits, and check off completions on a calendar view.

Title: Customer Segmentation
Description: An unsupervised learning project to group customers into segments based on their purchasing behavior (e.g., using K-Means clustering).

Title: AI-Powered Markdown Notes App
Description: A notes app where users write in Markdown. An 'AI' button uses an LLM API (e.g., OpenAI) to summarize or rewrite the note.

Title: Sentiment Analysis on Tweets
Description: An NLP model to classify tweets as positive, negative, or neutral. Involves cleaning (e.g., removing hashtags) and classification.

Title: Spotify Music App (API)
Description: A web app that uses the Spotify API. Users log in via OAuth, view their playlists, and get recommendations.

Title: Real-Time Polling App
Description: A full-stack app where a presenter can create a poll, and audience members can vote in real-time, with results displayed on a live-updating chart.

Title: Drawing App (Mobile)
Description: A mobile app with a blank canvas, color palette, and brush size options, allowing users to draw and save their artwork to the device gallery.
Required_material: Flutter SDK or React Native setup

Title: Traffic Sign Recognition
Description: A deep learning model (CNN) trained to recognize and classify traffic signs from images. (e.g., German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark).

Title: Build Your Own Text Editor
Description: A simple command-line text editor (like a simplified Vim or Nano) built from scratch in C. Teaches file I/O, terminal I/O, and data structures.

Title: Online Code Editor (Basic)
Description: A web app (like a simple CodePen) where users can type HTML, CSS, and JS, and see the rendered output in an iframe in real-time.

Title: Malware Analysis Sandbox (Basic)
Description: Set up an isolated virtual machine (VM) environment (e.g., using VirtualBox) to safely execute and analyze malware. Monitor network traffic (Wireshark) and system changes.

Title: AI Chatbot (Basic LLM)
Description: A web interface that connects to an LLM API (like OpenAI) to create a simple, conversational chatbot. Manages chat history state.
Required_material: Python or Node.js, React, OpenAI API Key

Title: Health & Fitness Tracker (Mobile)
Description: A native mobile app to log workouts, track metrics (e.g., steps, calories), and visualize progress with charts. Can integrate with HealthKit/Google Fit.

Title: Movie Recommendation System
Description: A model that recommends movies to users. Can be content-based (using movie genres/tags) or collaborative filtering (using user ratings).

Title: Trello Clone (Basic)
Description: A full-stack Kanban board. Users can log in, create boards, lists, and cards, and drag-and-drop cards between lists.

Title: Inventory Management System (Web)
Description: A web-based CRUD application for a small business to track product inventory, stock levels, suppliers, and sales.

Title: Project Management App
Description: A full-stack app for managing tasks. Users can create projects, assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress.

Title: Full-Stack AI-Powered Blog Platform
Description: A full-stack blog where users can register and write posts. AI features (using an LLM API) help users generate article ideas or summaries.
Required_material: Next.js, Database (e.g., Supabase), OpenAI API Key

Title: Instagram Clone UI (Mobile)
Description: A high-fidelity UI clone of the Instagram mobile app, focusing on the profile, feed, and stories UI. Data is hardcoded or mocked.
Required_material: Flutter SDK or React Native setup

Title: Real-Time Chat Application (Full-Stack)
Description: A full-stack chat app (like a simple Slack/Discord). Users can log in, join different 'rooms' or channels, and send messages in real-time.

Title: Simple E-commerce API
Description: A backend-only project for an e-commerce site. Includes user authentication (JWT), product listings (CRUD), and shopping cart logic.

Title: Network Anomaly Detection (ML)
Description: A machine learning model (e.g., Isolation Forest, Autoencoder) trained on network traffic data (like the KDD dataset) to detect anomalous or suspicious activity.

Title: Secure Chat Application (E2E Encryption)
Description: A chat application that implements end-to-end encryption, where messages are encrypted on the sender's device and decrypted only on the receiver's device.

Title: Food Delivery App (Full-Stack)
Description: A full-stack app (like Uber Eats). Features restaurants, menus, a shopping cart, user authentication, and order placement (mock payment).

Title: Write a Shell in C
Description: A simple command-line shell (like bash). Must be able to parse user commands, execute simple programs (e.g., /bin/ls), and handle basic built-ins (e.g., 'cd').

Title: Build a Simple Database
Description: Build a simple key-value store or a simple SQL-like database from scratch. Involves B-tree data structures, query parsing, and file I/O.

Title: E-Commerce Platform (Full-Stack)
Description: A complete, full-stack e-commerce website (like Amazon). Includes user auth, product search/filtering, shopping cart, and payment gateway integration.

Title: Social Media App (Full-Stack)
Description: A full-stack social media platform (like a simple Twitter/Instagram). Users can register, log in, create posts, follow other users, and see a feed.

Title: Image Caption Generator
Description: A deep learning model (using a CNN-RNN architecture) that automatically generates a descriptive caption for a given image.

Title: Content Management System (CMS)
Description: A full-stack application (like a simple WordPress) that allows non-technical users to create, edit, and publish content for a website through a secure admin panel.

Title: Build Your Own Lisp
Description: A project to build a Lisp interpreter from scratch in C or Python. Teaches parsing, abstract syntax trees (AST), and evaluation.

Title: Instagram Clone (Full-Stack)
Description: A full-stack clone of Instagram. Users can sign up, log in, upload photos, follow users, and see a feed of posts from users they follow.
Required_material: React Native, MERN Stack, Cloud Storage (e.g., S3, Firebase)

Title: Build Your Own Redis
Description: Re-implement the Redis server from scratch. Involves building a TCP server, parsing the Redis protocol, and implementing core data structures (strings, lists, hashes).

Title: Build a C Compiler (Partial)
Description: Write a compiler for a subset of the C language. Involves lexing (tokenizing), parsing (AST), and code generation (to assembly or another language).
